name: Prof. Jones' Trench Research Mission
description:
Congratulations! Prof. Jones is excited to invite you to participate in a mostly safe, definitely legal, and totally ethical trench research mission. You'll be diving solo in the best sub a public college can afford. The deepest parts of our ocean remain less explored than the solar system, can you believe that bu-- Anyway, dive in and collect as much research as you can. Don't forget to write it down, that's what makes it science!

This is my first solo Ludum Dare, first Unity project, first scripting project, but definitely not my first time crying about code at 11.37 pm on a Saturday.  I've watched my friends make games for the past several years and finally decided to dive in myself. Art, sound, scripts, and games all built by myself with a lot of technical support from Google and emotional support from my fiance. 

How to Play:

  • Click creatures to record them in your journal.
  • [D] to dive deeper
  • [Esc] to return to Main Menu
